title: Government shutdown? House GOP races against deadline
shortDescription: Congress has until 11:59 p.m. Friday to avoid a government shutdown.

title: Trump touts ICE arrest of pro-Palestinian student protester
shortDescription: Mahmoud Khalil's attorneys are challenging his arrest, which raises questions about First Amendment protections for non-citizen protesters.

title: DC begins removal of Black Lives Matter mural in front of White House
shortDescription: Crews began the process to remove the yellow “Black Lives Matter” mural that was erected one block from the White House during racial justice protests in 2020.

title: Trump repurposes CBP One app to encourage migrants to self-deport
shortDescription: Critics of the Biden-era CBP One app said migrants were abusing the asylum-request system to legally enter the United States, then disappear.

title: Trump golf course in Scotland vandalized by pro-Palestinian protesters
shortDescription: Palestine Action is taking credit for the vandalization of President Donald Trump's 'Trump Turnberry' golf course in southwest Scotland.

title: NASA to close chief scientist's office amid Trump cuts
shortDescription: Janet Petro, the acting director of NASA, announced the move Monday in a memo to staff obtained by USA TODAY.

title: 'Gaza is Not 4 Sale' painted on Trump-course
shortDescription: Pro-Palestinian graffiti was sprayed on a President Donald Trump's golf course and hotel in Turnberry, Scotland.

title: How Trump achieves the wildest dreams of conservatives | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Mass layoffs at the Department of Veterans' Affairs will begin as early as June. | Elon Musk loses billions as Tesla shares drop.

title: Canada's next prime minister pushes back on Trump in first speech
shortDescription: Carney, 59, will take the reins of his country at a time when it is locked in a trade war with the U.S., its largest trade partner.

title: Trump warns of government shutdown if House blocks funding bill
shortDescription: Trump says a government shutdown 'could happen' if the House fails to pass a six-month stopgap funding bill.

title: Fighter jets intercept another pilot near Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate
shortDescription: For the second time in as many days, NORAD F-16 jets escorted a civilian plane out of restricted airspace in Palm Beach County on Sunday afternoon.

title: 'Great relationship: Trump seeks to quell reported feud between Musk, Rubio
shortDescription: The dinner follows a New York Times report that Elon Musk clashed with Secretary of State Marco Rubio during a Cabinet meeting with Trump present.

title: What we know about the Trump agenda
shortDescription: It has delighted supporters and alarmed opposition, but can the Trump agenda overcome Congress and legal challenges? Here is what we know now.

title: A recession in 2025? Trump declines to make prediction
shortDescription: Asked in an interview with Maria Bartiromo whether the U.S. could soon face a recession, Donald Trump said, "I hate to predict things like that."

title: Secret Service shoots armed man after 'confrontation' near White House
shortDescription: The suspect was taken to an area hospital and his condition is not immediately available, officials said. No other injuries were reported.

title: Trump's Park Service cuts, tariff threats worry tourist town
shortDescription: In a tourist town still struggling to climb out from pandemic restrictions, Canadian tourists are canceling trips
